a box below will not change your tax or

taxable income.

35

your 
total tax.

Under penalties of perjury, I declare that I have examined this return and accompanying schedules and statements, and to the be
st of my knowledge 
and belief, they are true, correct, and accurately list all amounts and sources of income I received during the tax year. Decla
ration of preparer (other 
than the taxpayer) is based on all information of which the preparer has any knowledge.
